channel.title: Buying RSGP
channel.description: Would RSGP become more expensive or cheap if the update happens? And why?

item.title: Buying RSGP
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

Davidi2:

Jagex has stated they found ways to combat RWT; I think botting then transferring might become unsafe

This is what I think as well. I’m going to wait a week or two before doing and transfers/sales and see how things go for others. Might have to come up with a new system.

Read full topic

Thanks for the input guys!

Also, I’ll be willing to take as much GP as you’ll hand out, Krackkid and Pure2Veteran.
[/quote]Lol I will be doing mine monthly(maybe 10m a month idk me and pure will talk about it together <3).

[/quote]I was thinking of a godsword + 20m / week.

I want. I’m dirt poor. Like 300k. L.[/quote]

Join the club

item.title: Buying RSGP
item.dc:creator: @X_Entinity_X X Entinity X
item.description:
@X_Entinity_X wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:7, topic:376340”][quote author=X Entinity X link=topic=472277.msg3453855#msg3453855 date=1293926871]

I’m thinking cheaper, because it would be easier for them to transfer. However, it would probably be better to just bot multiple accounts and trade all the gp over to your main (or whatever one you would buy it for).

Now you sir are a genius, I never thought of that, and now i’m going to use it.
[/quote]Now you sir are a fucking retard, Everybody but you has realised that days ago.[/quote]

Ok dude, chill. I was simply stating my thoughts.

Read full topic
